seniority_level.evidence: 5-7 years of experience required, which aligns with senior level in data engineering roles

job_family.evidence: Title explicitly states 'Data Engineer' and responsibilities focus on data gathering, storage, and processing

sub_specialty.evidence: Mentions batch processing and BPM workflows, which typically involve ETL-like automation and integration

leadership_expectation.evidence: No mention of managing teams or mentoring; focus is on individual technical contributions and collaboration

primary_cloud.evidence: No cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP) mentioned in job description or Pass 1 extraction

secondary_clouds.evidence: No cloud platforms mentioned at all

processing_paradigm.evidence: Explicitly mentions both batch and real-time processing in responsibilities

orchestrator_category.evidence: No orchestrators like Airflow, Dagster, or cloud-native tools mentioned

storage_layer.evidence: No specific storage systems like data warehouses, lakes, or lakehouses mentioned

remote_restriction.evidence: Location restricted to Bengaluru East, Karnataka, India — implies regional requirement

timezone_focus.evidence: Location specified as India only, no mention of global or multi-timezone teams

relocation_required.evidence: Onsite work model and specific location in Bengaluru implies relocation may be required for non-residents

h1b_friendly.evidence: No visa sponsorship mentioned; location is India, not US

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: No mention of student visas or OPT/CPT; location is India, not US

citizenship_required.evidence: Location in India implies local work authorization required, no citizenship restriction stated

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Full-time permanent position implies W2 employment in India context

benefits_level.evidence: No benefits listed in Pass 1 extraction or job description

growth_path_clarity.evidence: General mention of 'accelerate impact' and 'meaningful change' but no specific career tracks or progression paths

mentorship_signals.evidence: Mentions collaboration with diverse teams and stakeholders, suggesting learning from others

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No explicit mention of promotions or advancement opportunities

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal transfers or role changes

career_tracks_available.evidence: No specific career tracks (IC, management, etc.) mentioned in job description

requirement_strictness.evidence: Multiple 'must have' skills with 5+ years experience required; no 'nice to have' skills listed

scope_definition.evidence: Role combines BPM application development, database integration, and process automation — spans multiple engineering domains

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: 5-7 years experience aligns with senior-level expectations; skills are specific to BPM and databases, not overly broad
